name: Backend
description: 'use strict'; Register 	Description:		Creates a new user given some registration parameters 	URL:					/user/register 	Method:				POST 	URL Parameters: 	None 	Request Body: 			{ 				"name":[string], 				"email":[string], 				"password":[string], 				"grad_year":[string],		// e.g. "Spring 2018" 				"subscribe":[boolean] 			}
